edu.umass.cs.sensors.falcon.model
Class EventTTUMonitor

java.lang.Object
  edu.umass.cs.sensors.falcon.model.EventTTUMonitor

public class EventTTUMonitor
extends Object

EventTTUMonitor class to store Cumulative Distribution of Time to Use (TTU) for events.

Each instance of EventTTUMonitor stores distributions for some specific event e. Let E-1(e) indicate a variable for an event observed before e and let E-2(e) give an event that was observed before E-1(e). Then an instance of this class stores following two cumulative distributions for some event e:

  • CDF of Next TTU: The distribution of time elapsed between event E-1(e) and e.
  • CDF of Second Next TTU: The distribution of time elapsed between event E-2(e) and e.

Since the CDF of TTU can vary according to the time of day (an event may occur more frequently during afternoon vs night), we allow creating CDFs for each equi-length period of day where the number of periods are specified in TemporalModel class.

Author:
Abhinav Parate, aparate@cs.umass.edu
